Title: This causes trouble! - Lessons from Several Heavy Liability Accidents
Publisher: Liaoning minzu chubanshe (辽宁民族出版社)
Notes: A set of safety production legal education wall charts was compiled and printed in 1987 to cooperate with the implementation of the instructions of the Party Central Committee, the National People's Congress Standing Committee and the State Council to overcome bureaucracy and strengthen safety production.Titled "Doing shoddy work and using inferior material harmed a family" (偷工减料害了一家), the poster recounts how, in 1986, 24-year old Wei X, who had moved to the city with his wife Peng X, was working on a construction site, finishing a balcony on the seventh floor, when it broke off. His wife, newly pregnant, who was working on the same site, saw him crashing down to his death. Foreman Li X was later convicted for cutting corners.
